description:
Quorum Eau De Toilette - A Timeless Masculine Statement

Experience the commanding presence of Quorum Eau De Toilette for men, a powerful masculine fragrance that has stood the test of time since its introduction in 1982. This classic men's cologne by Antonio Puig delivers a bold, sophisticated aroma that exudes confidence and authority. âœ¨

The Essence of Quorum

This 100ML men's fragrance opens with an invigorating burst of citrus and herbal notes that immediately command attention. As one of our best sellers, Quorum has earned its reputation as a signature scent for the distinguished gentleman who appreciates traditional masculine aromas with a modern edge. ðŸ”¥

Product Information
Size 100ML
Gender Men
Product Type Eau De Toilette
Concentration EDT
Brand Antonio Puig

Distinctive Fragrance Notes

Note Type Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Bergamot, Lemon, Artemisia, Green Notes
Heart Notes Pine, Carnation, Jasmine, Leather
Base Notes Tobacco, Oakmoss, Leather, Amber, Patchouli

Key Features of Quorum EDT:

  • Powerful, long-lasting masculine scent ðŸ’Ž
  • Classic aromatic fougÃ¨re composition
  • Distinctive green and woody character
  • Sophisticated bottle design with timeless appeal
  • Perfect for professional settings and evening wear
  • Excellent projection and sillage

The Legacy of Quorum

Created by Antonio Puig, Quorum has remained a staple in men's fragrances for decades. This classic cologne represents the golden era of powerhouse masculine scents from the 1980s, delivering unapologetic boldness that modern luxury fragrances often pay homage to. The distinctive green bottle with its cap resembling a chess piece symbolizes strategy and powerâ€”fitting for a scent named after a formal gathering of decision-makers. ðŸŒ¿

When to Wear Quorum Eau De Toilette

This men's EDT is ideal for the confident professional who appreciates traditional masculine scents. Its robust character makes it perfect for cooler weather, business settings, and evening occasions when you want to make a memorable impression. Join the ranks of distinguished gentlemen who have made Quorum their signature scent for decades. Discover why this timeless fragrance continues to captivate with its sophisticated blend of aromatic notes. ðŸ’«

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Quorum Eau De Toilette last on skin?
Quorum EDT offers impressive longevity, typically lasting 6-8 hours on most skin types. Its powerful projection is strongest during the first 2-3 hours, after which it settles into a pleasant, more intimate scent that continues to project throughout the day. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin, and consider layering with complementary grooming products from the Quorum line.
short_description: Discover Quorum EDT, a powerful masculine fragrance blending aromatic herbs, rich woods, and leather. This classic 100ML men's cologne delivers confidence and sophistication with its distinctive blend of bergamot, pine, and tobacco notesâ€”a timeless statement for the distinguished gentleman.
